original_text: Friends, we do not need to write anything to you about the dates and times when these things will happen. Thessalonians 4
korean_text: 형제들아 때와 시기에 관하여는 너희에게 쓸 것이 없음은

sentences.original_text: Friends, we do not need to write anything to you
sentences.korean_translation: 친구들여, 우리는 여러분에게 아무것도 쓸 필요가 없습니다
